page.title: 04POPULATION OF WHITTON
page.content: We did a survey to find out the age groups living in Whitton. Our results showed the following: 1st...35-55 years old..........35% 2nd...under 18 years old.......30% 3rd...18-35 years old..........21% 4th...55-70 years old...........8% 5th...over 70 years old.........6% This shows that most of the people are probably families with children. There are not many old people living in Whitton. Most of these people choose to live in Whitton and have lived here between 10-40 years. People who have lived in Whitton liked to stay there. Some of the reasons that Whitton is popular are that it is near to London and has good shopping facilities. Although a big disadvantage is the continual noise from planes going into Heathrow Airport. BISHOP PERRIN SCHOOL
